articles.description: Newcastle United will be permitted to loan players from the Saudi Pro League in January following a vote by Premier League clubs.
articles.title: Newcastle cleared to sign Saudi Pro League players

articles.description: Arsenal forward Beth Mead is back in Sarina Wiegman's England squad for the first time in over a year after recovering from an ACL injury.
articles.title: Mead returns to England squad after year out

articles.description: Transgender women are barred from playing in international women's matches under new International Cricket Council regulations.
articles.title: ICC bans trans women from women's internationals

articles.description: Wales host Turkey in their final Euro 2024 qualifier on Tuesday night knowing their dreams of a direct route to next summer's finals will be decided both in Cardiff and Croatia.
articles.title: Wales set for night of nerves against Turkey

articles.description: Former England international Ugo Monye accused a supporter of racist abuse on Sunday.
articles.title: Police make contact with man in Ugo Monye racist abuse case

articles.description: Manager Gareth Southgate praises England's "excellent" mentality after they come from behind to draw in North Macedonia in their final Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: 'Excellent' England mentality pleases Southgate

articles.description: Aaron Ramsdale "is too good to be a number two" for Arsenal, says former Gunners goalkeeper David Seaman.
articles.title: Ramsdale too good to be a number two - Seaman

articles.description: England back row Ben Earl will be available for the start of the Six Nations after Saracens receive a positive update on his knee problem.
articles.title: Earl fit for Six Nations after injury scare

articles.description: Former World Cup defender John O'Neill says Northern Ireland benefitted from employing a more direct style of play in their 2-0 win over Denmark.
articles.title: 'N Ireland should persist with more direct style'

articles.description: Hayley Turner becomes the first female jockey in Europe to ride 1,000 winners with victory on Tradesman at Chelmsford.
articles.title: Jockey Turner rides record 1,000th winner
